title: Antartica Song Lyrics Thuppakki Songs Lyrics

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Antartica venpaniyile
yen sarukkudhu nenjam
nee penguin-ah pen dolphin-ah
yen kulambudhu konjam

hey ye hey nisha .. nisha nisha
oh  o oh nisha nisha

adi pennae en, manadhu engae
radar vilakkuma ?
adi en kaadhal, aalam enna
sonaar alakkuma ? (2)

kadal alandhidum karuvigal
seyal ilandhidum avalidam
adiilakanam asaivadhai paarthaen

aval puruvathin kuviyalil
malai sarivugal thorpadhaal
vilum aruvigal azhuvadhai paarthaen

aval melae veyil vilundhaal
nilaa oliyaai maaripogum
aval asandhaal
andha asaivilum isai pirakkum

Antartica venpaniyile
yen sarukkudhu nenjam
nee penguin-ah pen dolphin-ah
yen kulambudhu konjam

thada thadavena raanuvam
pugundhidum oru saalayaai
adhirvudan nulaindhaayadi, ennil

iru vizhigalin kulaliley
pada padavena vedithaaydai
irudhayam thulaithaayadi kannil

unnaipolae oru pennai
kaanbenaa endru vazhdhaen
nee kidaithaal
en dhesam polae unnai nesippen

Antartica venpaniyile
yen sarukkudhu nenjam
nee penguin-ah pen dolphin-ah
yen kulambudhu konjam

hey ye hey nisha .. nisha nisha
oh  o oh nisha nisha

adi pennae en, manadhu engae
radar vilakkuma ?
adi en kaadhal, aalam enna
sonaar alakkuma ? (2)		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
Even in Antartica cold
why mind is slipping?
Are you a penguin? or a female dolphin?
why mind confuse a little ?

hey ye hey nisha .. nisha nisha
oh  o oh nisha nisha

hey girl, where is my mind?
can raddar explain ?
hey what is the depth of my love ?
can sonar measure it?

tools that measure sea
won't work with her
I saw her basic beauty moving

in her eye brow
hill slopes will lose
I saw falls crying

if sun rays fall on her
they’ll change into moon light
when she moves
there’s music in her movement

Even in Antartica cold
why mind is slipping?
Are you a penguin? or a female dolphin?
why mind confuse a little ?

like a military force
entering into a road
you trembled inside me

with two eyes curl
you burst like cracker - and
pierced in too heart with eyes

i lived  whether I will see
a girl like you or not
if I get you -I will love you
as much as my country

Even in Antartica cold
why mind is slipping?
Are you a penguin? or a female dolphin?
why mind confuse a little ?

hey ye hey nisha .. nisha nisha
oh  o oh nisha nisha

hey girl, where is my mind?
can raddar explain ?
hey what is the depth of my love ?
can sonar measure it?
